UAActionScheduleInfo Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAActionScheduleInfo.h

Overview

Defines the scheduled action.

Tasks

  •   triggers property
  •   limit property

Properties

actions

Actions payload to run when the schedule is triggered.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) NSDictionary *actions

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

end

The schedule’s end time. After the end time the schedule will be canceled.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) NSDate *end

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

group

The schedule’s group.

@property (nonatomic, readonly, nullable) NSString *group

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

isValid

Checks if the schedule info is valid. A valid schedule must contain at least 1 action, contains between 1 to 10 triggers, and the end time must be after the start time. Invalid schedules will not be scheduled.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) BOOL isValid

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

limit

Number of times the actions will be triggered until the schedule is canceled.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) NSUInteger limit

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

start

The schedule’s start time.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) NSDate *start

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

triggers

Array of triggers. Triggers define conditions on when to run the actions.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) NSArray<UAScheduleTrigger*> *triggers

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

Class Methods

actionScheduleInfoWithBuilderBlock:

Creates an action schedule info with a builder block.

+ (instancetype)actionScheduleInfoWithBuilderBlock:(void ( ^ ) ( UAActionScheduleInfoBuilder *builder ))builderBlock

Return Value

The action schedule info.

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

actionScheduleInfoWithJSON:error:

Factory method to create an action schedule info from a JSON payload.

+ (nullable instancetype)actionScheduleInfoWithJSON:(id)json error:(NSError *_Nullable *)error

Parameters

json

The JSON payload.

error

An NSError pointer for storing errors, if applicable.

Return Value

An action schedule info or nil if the JSON is invalid.

Declared In

UAActionScheduleInfo.h

Instance Methods

isEqualToScheduleInfo:

Checks if the schedule info is equal to another schedule info

- (BOOL)isEqualToScheduleInfo:(nullable UAActionScheduleInfo *)scheduleInfo

Parameters

scheduleInfo

The other schedule info to compare against.

Return Value

YES if the schedule infos are equal, otherwise NO.
